column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Charles - Thank you very much for your review. It's a time-tested truth in the restaurant business that word-of-mouth advertising is the best advertising there is. And to that end
column2: I am grateful you took your friend's recommendation and even more grateful that you enjoyed your dining experience with us. As an authentic ramen house
column3: JINYA aims to introduce aspects of Japanese dining and business culture that aren't yet familiar in the states
column4: namely our "Irrashai" greeting and the communal-dining tables. Understandably
column5: we're never going to be all things to all people
column6: but we will always work hard to provide the best Japanese ramen Houston has to offer.
